metadata.name: Suspicious Download From File-Sharing Website Via Bitsadmin
metadata.comment: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file from a suspicious domain

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\bitsadmin.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('bitsadmin.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /transfer ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /addfile '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.githubusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('anonfiles.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cdn.discordapp.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ddns.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dl.dropboxusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ghostbin.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('glitch.me')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gofile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mediafire.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mega.nz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('onrender.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pages.dev')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paste.ee')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.pl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastetext.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('send.exploit.in')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sendspace.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storage.googleapis.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storjshare.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('supabase.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('temp.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('transfer.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trycloudflare.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ufile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('w3spaces.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('workers.dev'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file from a suspicious domain

metadata.objective: False positive: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited. References: https://blog.netspi.com/15-ways-to-download-a-file/#bitsadmin, https://isc.sans.edu/diary/22264, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Bitsadmin/, https://symantec-enterprise-blogs.security.com/blogs/threat-intelligence/ransomware-hive-conti-avoslocker, https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ncas/alerts/aa22-321a, https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/blog/2024/01/17/new-ttps-observed-in-mint-sandstorm-campaign-targeting-high-profile-individuals-at-universities-and-research-orgs/
